title: Online crowdsourced data and atopic dermatitis—How the digital era opens new perspectives of the burden of skin disease
details: A Salava - Journal of the European Academy of Dermatology and …, 2024
abstract: The burden of atopic dermatitis (AD) remains insufficiently understood because it comprises such a wide spectrum of perspectives. For the individual patient, it means something very different than it is, when diagnosed by specialists, measured by …

title: Chatting Ethically: Practical Recommendations for Ethical Use of Large Language Models in Dermatology Practice, Research, and Education
details: ER Gordon, MH Trager, A Breneman, L Dugdale… - Clinical and Experimental …, 2024
abstract: As large language model (LLM) utilization increases, developing ethical standards for their applications to supplement dermatologists is critically important. Here, we summarize primary applications of LLMs in dermatology, their ethical implications …
